name: Shuriken Throw
description:
Shuriken Throw is a puzzle game where you have to hit all the targets using your shurikens. 

====================================================================================================

The stealthy ninja only has one chance to hit all the Targets to complete his training!

Add the Direction and Shurikens to the Action Bar. The goal is to hit all of the Targets in one turn. 

Without moving the player, throw shurikens in four directions. 

Only a few levels for now. 

Controls: 

Mouse - click stuff

Keyboard:

M - mute

Spacebar - show path grid

Esc - back
